CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV , MOT and CHI enter the room . MOT sits in the chair near the door . INV explains warm-up task to MOT
CHI hands the football to MOT and then picks up a different toy
MOT takes the football from CHI
CHI picks up toy car on the floor
CHI gives MOT the car . <aft> CHI picks up something else on the floor
MOT looks at CHI and smiles
CHI looks down at the toy duck he is holding
CHi looks down at the duck and slowly turns towards MOT
CHI hands toy duck to MOT
CHI goes over to the jack+in+the+box and picks it up and brings it over to MOT's lap
CHI places jack+in+the+box on MOT's lap
CHI takes the football from MOT
CHI looks down at the book
CHI sits on floor and starts to open the book
MOT points from her chair to the book CHI holds on the floor
CHI holds book and looks up towards the camera
CHI turns the last few pages of book
CHI points to a picture on the wall
<aft> CHI looks down at the book
MOT turns and looks at the wall behind her
CHI throws book into chair and gets up and gets the football
CHI throws the football to his MOT lap and then walks up to the other toys
MOT tries to catch the football but it bounces out of her hands
CHI takes toy car off the desk and rolls it on the floor
MOT makes a sound like car's engine
CHI puts down the car and picks up the toy duck and squeezes it
CHI continues to squeeze the duck
<bef> CHI stands up still squeezing duck
CHI points to the desk and then looks down at the duck
CHI looks at the toys on the floor
CHI drops duck on floor and reaches out for the jack+in+the+box on the desk
CHI puts jack+in+the+box on the floor and turns it over but cannot turn handle
CHI tries to turn the handle and hands the jack+in+the+box to MOT
MOT takes the jack+in+the+box from CHI
MOT looks down at CHI in anticipation
< .1-5 .> MOT turns handle as music plays
MOT looks at CHI with her mouth open
NOT pulls back clown's head to show CHI
MOT points down at the clown's head
MOT holds the jack+in+the+box stable for CHI
MOT helps CHI push the clown down in the box
CHI starts to close the lid
MOT helps CHI close the lid
the jack+in+the+box teeters on her lap
CHI holds the jack+in+the+box still for MOT
MOT starts to turn the handle
CHI grabs the jack+in+the+box and tries to throw it
<$= 2> MOT turns the handle of the jack+in+the+box
CHI runs over and holds tight to the jack+in+the+box
CHI tries to pull the jack+in+the+box away from MOT
MOT pulls jack+in+the+box away from CHI
MOT holds jack+in+the+box close to CHI and smiles
CHI laughs as jack+in+the+box pops near his face
<bef> MOT puts the jack+in+the+box down on the floor
CHI pushes clown down into box and then slams lid
MOT helps CHI close the lid
CHI picks up the toy football
<bef> CHI puts the football on the table
CHI looks up at the camera and the looks at MOT
CHI looks at MOT and then turns to face the camera
CHI holds up football and points it towards the camera
CHI puts ball on the table
the ball rolls a little on the table
CHI pulls on the ball so it falls off the chair
CHI watches it roll off onto the chair
CHI looks up at the camera then at MOT
<bef> CHI looks up at the wall behind MOT
CHI picks up book and puts it on stool
<aft> CHI walks across the room and picks up the jack+in+the+box
MOT is out of camera view
CHI looks up at the camera
MOT is referring to the noise of the camera shifting as CHI changes location
CHI puts jack+in+the+box on the table takes the ball off the chair
CHI holds out the football and looks at MOT
CHI throws the football behind the table out of camera view
CHI throws ball under table and runs after it
CHI is out of camera view
CHI throws the ball to the other side of the room
CHI runs over and retrieves the ball
CHI throws ball to wall next to MOT
MOT gets up to get the ball
CHI walks over to the table
MOT holds ball out to CHI
CHI turns and looks at MOT
MOT puts the ball down near her feet and turns over the toy car on the floor
CHI walks over and picks up the toy duck
<bef> CHI puts the duck on the table
CHI puts the football on the table
CHI looks down at the toys on the table

INV leaves the room while Small Scale Activity takes place and re-enters the room at 13:06:36 . INV explains the Forbidden Object task to MOT and has her sit next to CHI at the table . INV leaves the toys from Small Scale Activity on the table
INV talks to MOT about the task
CHI plays with the brush toy
INV takes the forbidden object out of the desk drawer
INV holds the object in front of CHI with one hand as she clears away the toys on the table with the other hand
CHI has one hand on the slinky and one hand on the brush toy
<bef> CHI glances down at the toys on the table
CHI reaches for the forbidden object
<aft> INV puts the object on the table and sets it into motion
CHI reaches for object and rests his other hand on the slinky on the table
CHI glances down at the slinky
MOT reaches out to restrain CHI but doesn't actually touch him
CHI reaches his hand slowly into the slinky
CHI places the slinky on the table next to the object
CHI tries to grab the object with his other hand
MOT motions to CHI's hand to keep him from touching the Forbidden Object
CHI sits back and smiles as he continues to looks at the object
CHI looks at MOT and then stares at the Forbidden Object with a large smile
CHI reaches for the balls on the end of the object

g.ga: balls on the end of the object

u.a: MOT moves her hand up and down
INV tells MOT about Parent Child Interaction boxes . INV picks up toys from Small Scale Activity . CHI tries to leave the room with INV
MOT takes CHI's hand and leads him over to the desk
MOT takes the first box off of the desk
MOT lowers box to CHI's eye level
CHI reaches in the box and removes the ball
CHI stares down at the ball
MOT puts the empty box on the table
CHI looks down at the ball
MOT leans down and looks at CHI
CHI walks over to the desk
CHI slams the ball down on the chair next to the desk
CHI turns to face MOT as he looks down at the ball
CHI walks over to the table and puts the ball down on it
CHI bounces the ball on the table
<aft> MOT takes the box off the table
CHI bounces the ball on the table twice
CHI looks up at the video camera
CHI points to the camera and then looks up at MOT
CHI smiles and shifts back and forth on his feet excitedly
MOT tries to bounce the ball to CHI but it slips out of her hands
CHI goes to retrieve the ball
CHI holds ball close to his chest
CHI looks in the box and points to it then turns around
CHI points over to the other boxes
MOT holds the box out to CHI
MOT puts the Ball box on the desk
CHI watches MOT as he smiles and stomps his feet in excitement and anticipation
MOT takes the next box off of the desk
MOT puts the box on the floor and sits beside it
CHI sits opposite MOT on floor and starts to remove cover of the box
CHI pulls on box to open it
noises indicating a struggle in opening the box
CHI lifts up cover of box
<$= 1> MOT picks up the towel and opens it
MOT covers her face with the towel
CHI does not pay attention to towel
CHI runs over and reaches for the other boxes on the desk
CHI reaches for boxes and looks up at MOT
MOT lifts towel in front of her face
<bef> CHI smiles at MOT . CHI points to the boxes on the desk and looks at MOT
CHI stands behind the towel and puts his face behind it briefly then walks away
CHI points to chair and then to camera
MOT lowers towel to her lap
CHI points around and looks at MOT
CHI walks to the other side of the room near peekaboo box
MOT puts the towel in the box
CHI gives the cover to MOT
MOT places the cover on the box
CHI runs over to the desk
CHI points to the boxes on the desk
MOT puts the box on the desk and gets the next one
CHI watches MOT as he smiles and stomps his feet in excitement and anticipation
<$= 1> MOT puts the box on the floor
CHI sits opposite MOT on the floor and puts one hand on the box
<bef> noise of difficulty in opening box
CHI reaches in and grabs a crayon
CHI looks down at the crayon
<aft> CHI draws on the paper with a crayon
MOT motions to paper in box
CHI sits back and watches MOT
MOT takes out the paper for CHI and puts it in front of him
MOT puts a piece of paper on floor in front of her and begins to draw
<bef> CHI squeals with excitement and then grunts
<bef> CHI crawls over to box . CHI empties the box of paper one sheet at a time throwing them behind him
MOT stops drawing briefly then resumes
CHI continues throwing paper on the floor behind him
CHI looks down at MOT briefly
CHI continues throwing paper on the floor behind him
<bef> MOT stops drawing . MOT shows CHI her drawing
CHI continues throwing paper on the floor
MOt putts her paper and crayon down on the floor
CHI empties the box and grabs a crayon
CHI holds crayons and looks up at MOT
MOT holds crayon in front of CHI
MOT pulls a piece of paper out
CHI drops a crayon on the floor and then retrieves it
CHI selects a crayon and draws
CHI mumbles and talks to himself quietly while drawing
<bef> CHI stops drawing , gets another piece of paper and another crayon and makes a mark
CHI looks up at MOT for approval
CHI puts paper down and starts drawing again
CHI switches colors and resumes drawing
CHI stops drawing and sits up then starts drawing again
CHI looks down at the crayons on the floor
CHI picks up the blue crayon
CHI draws on the paper briefly
CHI picks up a different crayon
CHI picks up a different crayon
MOT takes crayon and holds it over the paper
CHI puts his hand on MOT's paper
<aft> CHI draws on his own paper
MOT is drawing each letter as she names them
<aft> CHI shuffles the papers around and draws briefly
MOT shows the paper to CHI and looks at CHI
CHI looks down at MOT's paper
MOT points out the letters to CHI
End of PCI - Crayons and Paper
CHI drops the crayon in the box
MOT begins to clear away the crayons and paper
MOT pulls the box close to her
CHI picks up some crayons and drops them in the box
CHI puts some more crayons in the box and then walks over to where the paper is on the floor
CHI stares down at the papers
CHI goes over to the desk
CHI looks up at the activity boxes
CHI walks over to the paper box
MOT puts some paper in the box
CHI bends down and grabs some paper
CHI picks up the papers and throws them behind him in the box

CHI looks down in the box
MOT gathers the papers and puts them in the box
CHI picks up one of the papers
CHI drops the piece of paper in the box and goes to get the last one
CHI is stepping on the paper he is trying to pick up
CHI kicks his foot and gets the paper and drops it in the box

CHI pushes on the cover of the box
MOT covers the box and then stands up
CHI runs over to table with boxes
MOT is out of camera view
CHI watches MOt and stomps his feet excitedly
MOT puts the box down on the floor
CHI squeals with delight and laughs
MOT sits on the floor next to the box
CHI sits on the other side of the box

MOT puts the cover back on the box and moves it away
